title: taruNamidu tAnaiyyA
sahitya:
taruNamidu tAnaiyyA tamiyEnuk-karuL sheyya


anupallavi

  aruNan-udayam pOla azhagu viri mEniyanaE karuNai pongum vadananE kaDal pOlinbam peruga


caraNam    koDumai pala sheid-ulagil guNaminri vAzhndEnE koNDal taru min pOla vandadinrun uNarvoLiyE 
miDimai tavir vElavanE migha nondu sharaNaDaindEn viraivAga enranukkE mei jnAnam tandiDavE
